channel.title: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?
channel.description: How could i make an npc only attackable with a specific weapon, and if you didn't have that wweapon equipped, it would say "You must have a xxxx equipped to attack this npc"

item.source: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?

item.title: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Why didn’t I think of the AttackNPC boolean…
Ill try again

if (type == NPCID) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != WEP ID) { sM("You must use a WEP NAME to attack this monster!"); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?

item.title: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:3, topic:359669”]I’m not so good with this stuff, but your probably talking about deltascape. So i’ll give it a go.
NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != WEP ID){ sM("You need a WEP NAME to attack him"); } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEP ID){ ---do stuff when you can attack him---; } }[/quote]
If he did in fact have a delta, it would be much wiser to edit the AttackNPC boolean, rather than go into NPCHandler. He hasn’t told us what kind of source he is using though…

Read full topic
item.source: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?

item.title: Only Attackable with a specific weapon?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I’m not so good with this stuff, but your probably talking about deltascape. So i’ll give it a go.
NPCHandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != WEP ID){ sM("You need a WEP NAME to attack him"); } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == WEP ID){ ---do stuff when you can attack him---; } }

Read full topic
